description:
Get off the beaten path. This pack goes where no rolling suitcase can. Padded backpack straps carry the load comfortably, and tuck away stowing in overhead bins. A dedicated laptop compartment keeps you connected wherever you roam. As part of the Del Dia collection, its made from fabric remnants so it has extra personality.

  • Del Dia colourway uses upcycled scrap materials from Cotopaxi’s other packs, creating unique colour combinations to give you a one-of-a-kind pack. Del Dia colour combinations are random, so your pack will look a bit different than the one here. Your brilliant colour combination is something to look forward to, and who doesn’t love a good surprise?
  • Made form fabric remnants
  • Removable waistbelt and tuck-away shoulder straps
  • Full-length perimeter zip opens like a suitcase
  • Interior mesh compartments and pockets for easy organization
  • Side-zip lets you access the interior without taking it off
  • Padded side compartment for laptop and tablet
  • Top zippered compartment for phone and passport
  • 4 reinforced grab handles
  • External lash loops to attach gear or lock the bag to a fixed point
  • YKK zippers have theft-resistant webbing sewn across the openings
  • Cotopaxi designates 1% of their revenue to provide grants for non-profits
  • Cotopaxi products are guaranteed to last 61 years—the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world
name: Cotopaxi Allpa 35L Travel Pack - Unisex
